column5: Hey folks.  So I have to go to Kingston tomorrow for a meeting, is there any place that I can go and wet a line for a bit?  I don't know the town well at all but I'll have my GPS if anyone feels like sending me a PM with a decent place to go.  So if you see a guy in a suit fishing from shore say hi   Thanks all.  Geoff

try whippin a few off the causeway for pickerel or pike as well as of the puc docks near hotel dieu hospital. there is also thousands of lakes north of kingston that arent too far with some good shore fishing.
Kerr has the places covered, you can always cast near Confederation Basin, lots of pike in between the docks.  Cheers
I dont know about this time of year, but in the summer Theres lots of pike, bass and channel cats around the wolf island ferry docks.

Thanks all for the replies.  Between the meetings and the weather that was on it's way I never got to get out as I had to get back on the road.  But, I will keep this in mind next time I go there, cheers.  G
